summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1138, for the improvement of Twenty-first Avenue South from King Street to Norman Street, King Street, from Twentieth Avenue South to Twenty-first Avenue South, Weller Street, from Twenty-first Avenue South to Twentieth Avenue South; Lane Street, from Twenty-first Avenue South to Twentieth Avenue South and Norman Street, from Twenty-first Avenue South to Twenty-second Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers of proper dimensions together with all necessary, appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 12905 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
